title: My Sister In Law, La Pretora

sources.title: My Sister In Law, La Pretora
sources.description: A magistrate is torn between her job and marrying her childhood friend, all while her rivals hire her prostitute twin sister to impersonate her and tarnish her reputation. So, basically an Evil Twin story featuring Edwige in both roles. Well, maybe not exactly evil as the sisters end up working together.Â  Several different optional subtitles
